name: Magician's Intern
description:
Go get this book! Now the other one! Can you put back this tome?? Oh the life of an intern D:

Deliver the requested books on the other table as fast as you can, but be careful with all those magical books in your precarious hands!

Walk with WASD and move the camera with the mouse, use the left button to add a book in your pile, take the requested books to the empty table and right click to deliver it. Or use a controller, A(❌) to pick up, and X(🟥) to drop it.

Any and all bugs are our intern's fault.

Magician's Intern was made in 48h as a submission for the 2020 Game Maker's Toolkit Jam, with the theme "Out of Control". Made by two wonderful potatoes.

  • Artist: AnayaGF
  • Programmer: Gallo
